          <title>
            <string language="en">Storing elastic energy by stretching a bow</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Speicherung elastische Energie durch das 
Ausdehnen eines Bogens</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Enregistrant l'énergie élastique en étirant un
arc</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Armazenando a energia elástica esticando uma 
curva</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Memorizzando energia elastica allungando un arco</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Καταχωρώντας την ελαστική ενέργεια με το τέντωμα ενός
τόξου</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Salvando energía de elástico estirando un 
arqueamiento</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows a bow in its original (left) and stretched (right) form.</string>
          </description>

          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre un arc sous son

          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra uma curva em seu
